lead_paragraph: Officials in Paris promised an investigation into the attack on the TV star, who was robbed of $9 million in jewelry but was not physically injured.

byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Aurelien Breeden, Martin de Bourmont and Vanessa Friedman from Paris, and Niraj Chokshi and Jonah Engel Bromwich from New York.
byline.original: By ADAM NOSSITER and ELIZABETH PATON

headline.print_headline: Bound by Gunmen, Kim Kardashian Is Robbed of Millions in Jewels, Police Say
headline.main: Kim Kardashian Is Tied and Robbed of Millions in Jewels, French Police Say

snippet: Officials in Paris promised an investigation into the attack on the TV star, who was robbed of $9 million in jewelry but was not physically injured....
abstract: French officials investigate armed robbery of reality television star Kim Kardashian, who was allegedly tied up, gagged and robbed of jewelry worth almost $9 million in luxurious apartment in Eighth Arrondissement of Paris; highly publicized theft during Parish Fashion Week has negatively impacted tourism in France, which has already suffered following two major terrorist attacks since 2015.
